attributes.action: Make  all foreign visitors carry private medical insurance whilst in the UK .
attributes.background: The NHS losses millions of pounds every single day to foreign visitors using the NHS and not paying their invoices for treatment . We can easily obtain this money back by simply making all foreign visitors hold private medical insurance prior to being let into the country .

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182047
